title: Sparkling Gold Bangles - Delicate Vanka Bangaru Gajulu
materials: high-grade CZ stones with brilliant cut
features: Contemporary bangle design featuring spaced CZ stone clusters along a slender gold band. Features a secure clasp closure. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear yet radiant enough for special occasions.
occasions: as a gift for a loved one.
description: Delicate and modern design suitable for daily use. The CZ stones offer a diamond-like sparkle at a fraction of the cost. Made with high-quality 22K gold and finished with our signature Hyderabadi polish for exceptional luster and durability. A perfect blend of tradition and contemporary style.
